TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MenuCommands extends System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands
Public NotInheritable Class MenuCommands Inherits StandardCommands

summary.span: 定义一组 字段，每个字段都与宿主环境提供的命令函数相对应。

span.span: Defines a set of fields that each correspond to a command function provided by the host environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含一组 字段，可用于在使用 的 方法添加命令时指定要链接的命令。 contains a set of fields that can be used to specify a command to link when adding a command using the method of the .
